overview: It's all in the eyes. You can tell so much about a guy by looking into his eyes. You can tell if he's a top or a bottom and what kind of man he is in bed. You can tell if he's sincere or if he's a jerk. But this guy Dino Di Marco had the most beautiful eyes I'd ever seen. They seemed to be filled with lust and excitement and anticipation like you wouldn't believe. Dino's the one. He's the man with the Hungry Eyes.
title: Hungry Eyes
